TopicTitle: Apollo Mission Recreation (And More!) [Requesting Ground Crew Aid!]

Articles.Content:
That's possible, would you mind if i use my own install? Or should i build something with the mods you are suggesting?

But i might shut down the public server temporarely to improve connection performance.

Just use FASA and RSS/RO (and all RO required mods), RT and Telemachus. One of the failure mods would be preferable, but not as needed. Those are all I say is required.

As to shutting down the server, that is perfectly fine, just let the KMC know. Shouldn't be down for long, should be done with the mission by 3:30.

- - - Updated - - -

I will probably be able to make it, pending some successful mod installations.

What booster will we use? And what will the satellite's mass be?

The booster will be the S1 from FASA, and the satellite is still needing to be made. It's just going to be a Comsat.

- - - Updated - - -

I could probably get there. It's at lunch time for me, but I'll change it to launch time

As retro for this launch, you'll still manage the launch however that will mostly be booster's job. So as long as it doesnt hinder you or make you unable to speak, you should be able to eat. But if I say put the sandwich down, it means your risking the mission.

The booster will be the S1 from FASA, and the satellite is still needing to be made. It's just going to be a Comsat.

Do we really need a Saturn I for a comsat ?

The S1 has a capacity to LEO of 9t, which seems a bit overkill for a single satellite.

Also, who would have to design the sat ?
Okay, i'll prepare the gamedata folder for the upcoming session.
Seeing that I likely can't do FAO, would I be able to do PAO?

Do we really need a Saturn I for a comsat ?

The S1 has a capacity to LEO of 9t, which seems a bit overkill for a single satellite.

Also, who would have to design the sat ?

Do you have a better suggestion? Besides, we need to work with Saturn hardware.

I haven't built anything for RSS in a while, I want to try to make it, but the best will go. Everyone can submit- I just got an idea.

Everyone can submit a design to me, AND single photo of it in the VAB. I will release them Wednesday and whichever one gets the most votes for, is what we will use.

- - - Updated - - -

Seeing that I likely can't do FAO, would I be able to do PAO?

If you feel up to it, sure. Your likely role normally in this situation would be to fill any empty or missing roles.

- - - Updated - - -

Okay, i'll prepare the gamedata folder for the upcoming session.

Awesome, thanks Mk3424.
Do we have a DMP server set up?

Do you have a better suggestion? Besides, we need to work with Saturn hardware.

I haven't built anything for RSS in a while, I want to try to make it, but the best will go. Everyone can submit- I just got an idea.

Everyone can submit a design to me, AND single photo of it in the VAB. I will release them Wednesday and whichever one gets the most votes for, is what we will use.

Booster requirements and part mods allowed ?

Lastly, I Am going to pitch the idea of this to Kasper later today since I decided to also make the final livestream into a CHARITY livestream. Meaning whoever is the PAO, has to also make the stream good enough for people to give money too and represent the people we are donating.

- - - Updated - - -

Booster requirements and part mods allowed ?

Minimize the mods. Try to use stock parts if at all possible.

Your choice of boosters are: Saturn, Titan or Atlas.
